name: Stack Exchange kuroi
description: This is a much darker themed style sheet for the Stack Exchange(and all of it's sub-domains/forums/niches). I also took the liberty of removing the ads and silly notifications. You're welcome.

user.name: AntonioKowatsch
user.about:
I'm just an adventurer. Looking for new challenges.
Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.
My fields of expertise are chemistry, physics and penetration testing.

additional_info: If you don't already have a stack exchange account you should create one, it's basically like yahoo answers just a thousandfold superior in it's execution.
